text: Fabio Mamerto Rivas Santos (11 May 1932 â€“ 11 August 2018) was a Dominican Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Cabirmota, La Vega. Rivas Santos was ordained to the priesthood in 1965. He was the Bishop of Barahona from 1976 until his resignation in 1999. Rivas Santos died on 11 August 2018 in Jarabacoa, Dominica. He was 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Fabio Mamerto Rivas Santos at Catholic-Hierarchy.org Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dominican Republic people Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Fabio Mamerto Rivas Santos
